newsitem.title: USA: Xionics to buy Xerography Laser.
newsitem.headline: Xionics to buy Xerography Laser.

text.p: Xionics Document Technologies Inc said Thursday it has agreed to acquire Xerography Laser Images Corp for about $5.2 million in cash and stock.
Terms must be approved by Xerography Laser stockholders.
The company also announced it has acquired a non-exclusive license giving it immediate access to all Xerography Laser printing technology.
Xionics designs, develops and markets software and silicon for printing, scanning, copying, processing and transmitting paper documents to computer peripherals.
